Objective: Verify navigating to Downloads page from My Account Download link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click 'Downloads' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Downloads Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Downloads Page

Objective: Verify navigating to Download page from Download right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Downloads in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Downloads Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Downloads Page

Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Downloads in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Downloads Page and a text "You have not made any previous downloadable orders!" should be shown
Actual Result: The User is taken to Downloads Page and a text "You have not made any previous downloadable orders!" is shown

Objective: Verify continue button in Downloads page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Downloads in right column options
3) Click Continue button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account Page

Objective: Verify the Downloads Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Place a few downloadable orders
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Downloads in right column options
4) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Downloads Page should work in all supported environments
